title: Release Checklist v24.06
body:
Release Checklist for v24.06: | Status | Task | Start | End | Owner| | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | |**Pre-release**| | | | |
  • - [X]
| Notification to team of last feature sprint in milestone | 2024-05-13 | 2024-05-24 | @mattahrens | |
  • - [X]
| Burndown (no new features for current release) | 2024-05-27 | 2024-06-07 | Team| |
  • - [ ]
| Update docs for current release in spark-rapids without updating release links |2024-06-06 | 2024-06-10 | Team| |
  • - [ ]
| Create a PR to update release links |2024-06-06 | 2024-06-06 | @nvliyuan | |
  • - [X]
| Get RAPIDS 24.08 cudf java build working. |2024-05-17 | 2024-05-21| @NvTimLiu | |
  • - [X]
| Create 24.08 branch including spark-rapids-{jni,private} and spark-rapids | 2024-05-23 | 2024-05-24 | @NvTimLiu | |
  • - [X]
| Automerge from 24.06 to 24.08 | 2024-05-23 | 2024-05-24 | @NvTimLiu | |
  • - [X]
| Enable Jenkins builds (premerge, nightly, integration, performance) for 24.08 | 2024-05-23 | 2025-05-28 | @NvTimLiu | |
  • - [ ]
| [spark-rapids-private 24.06] Java release to sonatype | 2024-06-07 | 2024-06-07 | @NvTimLiu | |
  • - [ ]
| [spark-rapids-jni 24.06] Java release to sonatype | 2024-06-07 | 2024-06-07 | @NvTimLiu | |
  • - [ ]
| [cudf 24.06] Java release to sonatype | 2024-06-07 | 2024-06-07 | @NvTimLiu | |
  • - [ ]
| Notify RAPIDS team of javadocs for 24.06 | 2024-06-11 | 2024-06-11 | @GaryShen2008 | |**Staging release**|||| |
  • - [X]
| Make 24.08 the default branch | 2024-06-03 | 2024-06-03 | @jlowe | |
  • - [ ]
| Enable static scanning on the new 24.08 branches | 2024-06-11 | 2024-06-11 | @GaryShen2008 | |
  • - [ ]
| Merge all remaining branch-24.06 PRs | 2024-06-07| 2024-06-07 | Team | |
  • - [ ]
| Update spark-rapids-jni dependency version |2024-06-07 |2024-06-07 | @NvTimLiu | |
  • - [ ]
| Create CHANGELOG.md | 2024-06-07 | 2024-06-07 | @NvTimLiu | |
  • - [X]
| Deliver Snapshot packages to QA | 2024-06-03 | 2024-06-03 | @NvTimLiu| |
  • - [ ]
| Create a PR (not squashed) to merge from branch-24.06 to main. Needs review from repository owner | 2024-06-07 | 2024-06-07 | @NvTimLiu| |
  • - [ ]
| Trigger the release for spark-rapids Jenkins job on the main branch and deploy the jar to sonatype staging (including spark-rapids-tools/core) | 2024-06-11 | 2024-06-11 | @NvTimLiu| |
  • - [ ]
| Deliver final packages to QA | 2024-06-11 | 2024-06-11| @NvTimLiu| |
  • - [ ]
| Run integration tests on staging jars with AQE on, UCX on, Databricks Azure, Databricks AWS, Dataproc | 2024-06-11 | 2024-06-14 | @NvTimLiu| |
  • - [ ]
| Run LHA tests on staging jars | 2024-06-11 | 2024-06-14 | @NvTimLiu| |
  • - [ ]
| CDH testing | 2024-06-11 | 2024-06-11 | @NVTimLiu | |
  • - [ ]
| QA testing with Snapshot on YARN, NGC with Volta and Ampere | 2024-06-03 | 2024-06-11 | @yuange98| |
  • - [ ]
| Run pre-processing workflow for [DLRM sample use case](https://github.com/NVIDIA/DeepLearningExamples/tree/master/PyTorch/Recommendation/DLRM#advanced)|2024-06-11 |2024-06-14 | @johnzhong | |
  • - [ ]
| QA testing with final packages on YARN, NGC with Volta and Ampere | 2024-06-11 | 2024-06-14| @yuange98| |**Release**| | | | | |
  • - [ ]
| Tag the release and deploy the staging artifacts to maven central repository | 2024-06-18| 2024-06-18 | @NvTimLiu| |
  • - [ ]
| Update gh-pages | 2024-06-17 | 2024-06-18 | @nvliyuan | |
  • - [ ]
| Test [spark-rapids-examples repo](https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids-examples) with Spark-Rapids 24.06 | 2024-06-16 | 2024-06-16 | @nvliyuan | |
  • - [ ]
| Update docs for current release in spark-rapids-examples | 2024-06-17 | 2024-06-18 | @nvliyuan | |
  • - [ ]
